name: Build a Bug!
description:
Chuck chuck chuck, 

digging up chunks of earth,

finding pieces of hidden treasures,

carrying it with me,

so I  could create a bug to accompany me.

Notes / Found bugs:

Sometimes you cannot jump when you're stuck in a hole, try standing on a higher block to jump out if possible.

Sometimes interactive button is a bit unresponsive, but pressing multiple times usually would work!

🎅This game is the Christmas present for Joel, as part of the 2021 Secret Santa Game Jam! 

Music : Soft Sphere - Dovetail

Low poly house asset : Amaru Vera
